name: A Stickman Shooter - Sniper Vs Shooting Assassin Soldiers
name_original: A Stickman Shooter - Sniper Vs Shooting Assassin Soldiers
description:
Grab your weapon, and get ready for a wild, action packed shooter game! Choose from a variety of cool stickman characters as you blast your way though all the bad guys. Be careful though, the bad guys will shoot back!

FEATURES

- All characters unlocked. How cool is that!
- Action packed stickman style game.
- Cool graphics.
